## Lush cherry meets rich chocolate. A testament to meticulous craftsmanship and Oregon viticulture. Bouquets of dark cherry and black currant, intertwine with indulgent notes of coffee and chocolate. Subtle hints of black tea, pie crust, and baking spice add layers of complexity to this fruit-forward and juicy wine. $55.00
[All wines are currently available  
for in-person sales only.
